ISSUE.TITLE: Not accurate "Languages" section in Github
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop Steps to reproduce the problem: The "languages" section on Github is mostly for specifying the code we wrote and not libraries we use. So I suggest to remove UI libraries in web project by adding these two lines to `.gitattributes` file: - `src/Presentation/Nop.Web/wwwroot/lib/** linguist-vendored` - `src/Presentation/Nop.Web/wwwroot/lib_npm/** linguist-vendored` Also, you might want to specify the `.cshtml` files as part of C# language: - `*.cshtml linguist-language=C#` ![Languages](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/15688908/1dbd82f6-b064-46fa-93f7-ba58546d6ef5)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6851 Changes on the "Languages" section in GitHub
